description: A classic number puzzle game where you slide tiles to combine numbers and reach the 2048 tile. Perfect for developing logical thinking and strategic planning skills.

howToPlay: Use arrow keys (↑↓←→) or swipe to move all tiles in the specified direction
When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one, doubling the value
Every move spawns a new tile (2 or 4) in an empty spot
Try to reach the 2048 tile to win the game
Continue playing after 2048 to achieve even higher scores

controls.keyboard: Arrow keys (↑↓←→) to move tiles in four directions
controls.mouse: Click and drag to swipe tiles
controls.touch: Swipe in any direction to move tiles

tips: Keep your highest number in one corner (recommended: bottom-left or bottom-right)
Build numbers in ascending order along edges
Don't move your highest tile unless absolutely necessary
Avoid moving large numbers to the center
Keep one row or column filled to provide stable positioning for large numbers
Focus on merging smaller numbers to make room for larger ones

introduction: 2048 is the addictive number puzzle game that challenges players to combine tiles and reach the elusive 2048 tile. This mathematical brain teaser improves logical thinking, pattern recognition, and strategic planning skills while providing endless entertainment.
features: Score tracking and personal best records
No time pressure - play at your own pace
Undo function available in some versions
learningObjectives: Develop strategic thinking and long-term planning skills
Improve pattern recognition and spatial reasoning abilities
Practice mental math and number relationships understanding
Enhance problem-solving and logical reasoning abilities

title: Count Masters: Stickman Games
description: Control stickman characters to collect numbers and learn counting and basic math operations through fun gameplay.

howToPlay: Control your stickman character using arrow keys or mouse
Collect numbers and mathematical symbols as you move
Solve simple math problems to progress through levels
Avoid obstacles and reach the finish line with the correct answer

description: Battle in the numbers arena with fast-paced math calculations and competitive gameplay.

howToPlay: Drag and drop numbers to merge identical ones
